home.title: Welcome to Grupy São Carlos
home.subtitle: A welcoming community for everyone who wants to learn and share knowledge about Python in São Carlos and surrounding areas.
home.description: Grupy São Carlos is a Python programming language user community that meets regularly to exchange experiences, learn together and strengthen the regional tech ecosystem.

community.title: Welcoming Community
community.description: A safe and inclusive space for people of all experience levels, from beginners to experts.

learning.title: Practical Learning
learning.description: Workshops, talks and coding dojos to learn Python in a practical and fun way.

networking.title: Networking
networking.description: Connect with other pythonistas, form partnerships and discover professional opportunities.

home.eventsDescription: Our events are always free and open to the public. Come learn, teach and be part of this amazing community!
home.joinDescription: Regardless of your experience level with Python, you are welcome here. Come learn, teach and grow with us.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.noEvents: No events scheduled at the moment. Stay tuned to our social media!

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: Learn about Grupy São Carlos' journey, from its founding to the present day, and how we became a reference in the regional Python community.
history.originStory: In 2015, a small group of Python enthusiasts in São Carlos realized the need to create a local space to share knowledge and experiences about this language that was growing rapidly in the Brazilian tech scene. Inspired by Python user groups (GruPys) that already existed in other cities like São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro and Campinas, we decided to found Grupy São Carlos with the goal of democratizing access to Python knowledge in the region. What started as informal meetings in cafes and borrowed rooms quickly evolved into a structured community that is now a reference in the interior of São Paulo state.
history.historicalPhotosDescription: Some memorable photos from our journey over the years.
history.contributePhotos: Want to contribute historical photos? Contact us!

achievements.participantsDesc: Different people have already participated in our events
achievements.recognitionDesc: Active participation in the Python Brasil community
achievements.impactDesc: Reference for São Carlos and region

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Relive the best moments from our events and see how our community grows with each meetup.
gallery.contributeDescription: Attended an event? Help document our history by sharing your photos!
gallery.newEventDescription: First, let's create an event to organize your photos.
gallery.noPhotosDescription: Be the first to share photos from our events!

codeOfConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfConduct.subtitle: Our commitment to maintaining a welcoming, diverse and respectful community for everyone.
codeOfConduct.notice: This code of conduct applies to all events, online spaces and communications related to Grupy São Carlos.
codeOfConduct.missionDescription: Grupy São Carlos is committed to being a harassment-free community for everyone, regardless of sex, gender identity and expression, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, skin color, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof) or technology choices. We do not tolerate harassment of community participants in any form. Sexual language and images are not appropriate anywhere in the community, including talks, workshops, parties, Twitter and other online media.
codeOfConduct.reportingDescription: If you witness or suffer any unacceptable behavior, or have other community-related concerns, contact us immediately:
codeOfConduct.confidentiality: All reports will be treated with confidentiality and seriousness. We will take appropriate measures to deal with the situation fairly and transparently.
codeOfConduct.githubDescription: For the most updated and detailed version of our Code of Conduct, check our official repository on GitHub.

inclusion.title: Inclusion and Diversity
inclusion.description: We value the participation of all people, regardless of their experience, gender, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, race, ethnicity, age, religion or nationality.

respect.title: Mutual Respect
respect.description: We treat all participants with dignity and respect, creating an environment where everyone feels safe to learn and share.

safety.title: Safe Environment
safety.description: We do not tolerate harassment, discrimination or inappropriate behavior in any form, whether in person or online.
